text: Disney Plus’ schedule for July 7 to July 13, 2025, includes Ancient Aliens: Origins Season 1, The Academy, Suspicious Minds, and ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires. On July 9, Ancient Aliens: Origins Season 1 drops on Disney Plus with a total of 12 episodes. The series delves deep into the unsolved mysteries of the ancient aliens. Every episode features experts discussing thoughts on the complicated events from astonishing engineering to sky gods and UFOS. Further, The Academy, directed by Julia Jansch, premieres on the streaming platform. It follows the journey of a South African woman from the outskirts of Cape Town. She learns about the nuances of life through the ocean while preparing for the Round Robben Island race with The Academy. Also coming out on the streamer is the drama series Suspicious Minds. The show follows a clever thief named Amber, travelling to the Isla Esperanza to get her hands on the Tiara of Santa Águeda. However, things turn upside down when her former partner, Rui, shows up, who had betrayed her in the past. Additionally, ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires will be available on the streaming platform. The horror film focuses on the summer trip of the zombie couple, Zed and Addison. Nonetheless, their peace is short-lived when they find themselves stuck between the rivalry of Daywalkers and Vampires. New Disney Plus rel New Disney Plus releases for July 7-July 13, 2025 Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from July 7 to July 13, 2025. Wednesday, July 9 Ancient Aliens: Origins (S1, 12 episodes) People and Places: Shorts – Premiere The Academy Camp Alec I Scream, You Scream Sophie and the Baron Thursday, July 10 Summer Baking Championship (S1, 8 episodes) Suspicious Minds – Premiere Friday, July 11 Jaws @ 50: The Definitive Inside Story ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires – Premiere For more Disney content, check out an update on Scarlett Johansson’s upcoming movie, Tower of Terror.
html:
Disney Plus’ schedule for July 7 to July 13, 2025, includes Ancient Aliens: Origins Season 1, The Academy, Suspicious Minds, and ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires.

On July 9, Ancient Aliens: Origins Season 1 drops on Disney Plus with a total of 12 episodes. The series delves deep into the unsolved mysteries of the ancient aliens. Every episode features experts discussing thoughts on the complicated events from astonishing engineering to sky gods and UFOS.

Further, The Academy, directed by Julia Jansch, premieres on the streaming platform. It follows the journey of a South African woman from the outskirts of Cape Town. She learns about the nuances of life through the ocean while preparing for the Round Robben Island race with The Academy.

Also coming out on the streamer is the drama series Suspicious Minds. The show follows a clever thief named Amber, travelling to the Isla Esperanza to get her hands on the Tiara of Santa Águeda. However, things turn upside down when her former partner, Rui, shows up, who had betrayed her in the past.

Additionally, ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires will be available on the streaming platform. The horror film focuses on the summer trip of the zombie couple, Zed and Addison. Nonetheless, their peace is short-lived when they find themselves stuck between the rivalry of Daywalkers and Vampires.

New Disney Plus rel

New Disney Plus releases for July 7-July 13, 2025

Below are all the new TV shows and movies being added to Disney Plus from July 7 to July 13, 2025.

Wednesday, July 9

  • Ancient Aliens: Origins (S1, 12 episodes)
  • People and Places: Shorts – Premiere
  • The Academy
  • Camp Alec
  • I Scream, You Scream
  • Sophie and the Baron

Thursday, July 10

  • Summer Baking Championship (S1, 8 episodes)
  • Suspicious Minds – Premiere

Friday, July 11

  • Jaws @ 50: The Definitive Inside Story
  • ZOMBIES 4: Dawn of the Vampires – Premiere

For more Disney content, check out an update on Scarlett Johansson’s upcoming movie, Tower of Terror.
